title: Despite climate change promises, governments plan to ramp up fossil fuel production
content:
1. Despite climate change promises, governments plan to ramp up fossil fuel production  NPR
  2. Climate change: Fossil fuel production set to soar over next decade  BBC News
  3. Fossil fuel production 'dangerously out of sync' with global climate targets, UN warns  CNBC
  4. Climate change: U.N. report finds that governments still plan to increase fossil fuel production  CBS News
  5. Fossil fuel plans would make climate goals impossible, study finds  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Climate change: U.N. report finds that governments still plan to increase fossil fuel production  CBS News
Fossil fuel plans would make climate goals impossible, study finds  The Washington Post

localize.title: 気候変動対策の公約とは裏腹に、各国政府は化石燃料の増産を計画している
尽管有气候变化的承诺，各国政府仍计划加大化石燃料的生产力度
儘管有氣候變化的承諾，各國政府仍計劃加大化石燃料的生產力度
